booking.title: Booking
booking.room_placeholder: Please choose a kind of room

room.room_name: Please select a kind of room

data.title: Regarding accommodation FAQ
data.question: Q. What if I suddenly become unwell during my stay at the hotel?
data.answer: A. Staff who can speak Japanese are on duty at the hotel 24 hours a day to provide customer support. If a customer reports that they are not feeling well, we will ask about their symptoms and situation, and then introduce them to the nearest hospital and make arrangements.

data.question: Q. Check-in is at 3:00?
data.answer: A. If you are arriving before 3:00 p.m. due to transportation issues such as airplanes, please let us know your flight number and arrival time in advance. We will respond as soon as possible. However, if you need to guarantee your room upon arrival at the hotel, you will be required to pay an early check-in surcharge. 100% discount until 10:00 AM on the day, 50% discount from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM

data.question: Q. Can I use the room before check-in time or after check-out time?
data.answer:
A. お部屋に空きがある場合は、承ることができます。(有料)
・10:00 a.m.より前のアーリーチェックイン：一泊分の100%チャージ
・10:00 a.m.より後のアーリーチェックイン：一泊分の50%チャージ
・18:00 p.m.までのレイトチェックアウト：一泊分の50%チャージ
・18:00 p.m.以降のレイトチェックアウト：一泊分の100%チャージ

data.question: Q. Is there a curfew?
data.answer:
A.　If the room is available, we can accommodate you. (Charged)
・Early check-in before 10:00 a.m.: 100% charge for one night.
・Early check-in after 10:00 a.m.: 50% charge for one night.
・18:00 p.m. Late check-out before: 50% charge for one night
・Late check-out after 18:00 p.m.: 100% charge for one night.

data.question: Q. Can I use electronic devices as is?
data.answer: A. Available. The outlet type is A type, the same as in Japan, but the voltage in Vietnam and Cambodia is mostly 220V, so please be careful when using it. Japanese electrical products can be used without a transformer if they are compatible with 100 to 240V, but we recommend that you read the instruction manual of the electrical product you plan to use just to be sure. However, please note that even products compatible with 100-240V may require a plug conversion adapter.

data.question: Q. Are all restaurants non-smoking? Is there a smoking area in the lobby?
data.answer: A. All branches have ashtrays near the exit doors.

data.question: Q. Can I check in late at night or check out early in the morning?
data.answer: A. It is possible. Please rest assured that the reception is open 24 hours a day. Payments can be made at any time, so please inquire at reception when you have time.

data.question: Q. Can you keep my luggage after check-out?
data.answer: A. We will take care of it for you. We apologize for the inconvenience, but please take care of your valuables yourself.

data.question: Q. Can I use the open-air bath for free after checking out?
data.answer: A. Guests can use the open-air bath free of charge on the day of check-in and check-out. Please use it before your late night flight.

data.question: Q. If I am staying for a long time, is it possible to leave midway?
data.answer: A. It is possible. There will be no cancellation fee if you notify us at least 48 hours prior to 3:00 pm on the day you wish to change your check-out.

data.question: Q. Are there seasonal or weekend charges?
data.answer: A. There is no change in price

data.title: Regarding various services FAQ
data.question: Q. Can I reserve a massage in advance?
data.answer: A.A. Yes, it is possible. We recommend that you should make a reservation in advance, as it can be very busy in the evenings and on weekends.

data.question: Q. Is there a currency exchange service?
data.answer: A.A. We only accept exchanges from foreign currencies (Japan Yen/USD) to Vietnam Dong. We will exchange money according to our hotel's own exchange rate.

data.question: Q. Is there a coin laundry?
data.answer: A. Unfortunately, it is not in the hotel, but you can use the hotel's laundry service. Estimated cost: 1 shirt = 20,000 dong (about 100 yen). You can also use washer/dryers for free at some branches.

data.question: Q. Do you have an iron?
data.answer: A. We do not have irons for rent. Our staff will do the ironing for you, so please let the reception know if you request to do this.

data.question: Q. What is the internet environment in the guest rooms?
data.answer: A. Wi-Fi is available free of charge in public spaces, all guest rooms, and restaurant.

data.title: Breakfast FAQ
data.question: Q. What kind of breakfast is included?
data.answer: A. Although it different depending on each branch, we offer buffet style and set meal style. Both of style offer Japanese and Western cuisine. If you have any allergies, please let us know in advance.

data.question: Q. Please tell me which stores offer buffet.
data.answer:
A. We offer buffet style breakfast at all branch. 
※Due to special case, we may change to a set menu.

data.question: Q. Is there a plan without breakfast?
data.answer: A. Breakfast is included in the accommodation fee, and there are no discounts if you do not wish to eat breakfast. If you are unable to enjoy breakfast due to an early departure, we will prepare rice balls or sandwiches. Please let us know at the reception by the day before.

data.title: Access FAQ
data.question: Q. Is there a shuttle service between the airport and the hotel?
data.answer: A. You can use it for a fee. There have been many cases of overcharging by regular taxi at the airport, so for your safety, please use these services. When using the shuttle service, the driver will be waiting at the exit holding with your name on it. Prices may different by each branch, so please refer to the business services page for each branch.

data.question: Q. Is there a convenience store?
data.answer: A. Nó không nằm trong tòa nhà khách sạn nhưng nằm trong khoảng cách đi bộ đến từng chi nhánh. Nhân viên của chúng tôi sẽ sẵn lòng hỗ trợ bạn, vì vậy vui lòng cho chúng tôi biết.

data.question: Q. Is there a parking lot?
data.answer: A. We're sorry, but we don't have parking. If you come by bike, we will direct you to a nearby parking lot.

data.title: Payment FAQ
data.question: Q. Can I pay online?
data.answer: A. We are sorry, but we do not online payment service. If you want to pay by bank transfer before check-in, please let us know when making your reservation.

data.question: Q. When should I pay?
data.answer: A. We ask that you pay for your stay in advance when you check in. If you want to pay by bank transfer, payment must be made before check-in. (*Bank transfer after checkout is only possible for companies that have a corporate contract with us).

data.question: Q. Is it possible for the company to make a bank transfer from a Japanese account instead of paying on-site by the guest? If possible, in what currency will payment be made?
data.answer: A. Yes, it is possible. We ask that you pay any foreign remittance transfer fees. The currencies that can be used for payment are Japanese yen, US dollar, and Vietnamese dong.

data.question: Q. Is it possible to pay by bank transfer even for a short stay of a few days to a few weeks?
data.answer: A. Yes, it is possible.

data.question: Q. If I am staying for a long time and my company uses bank transfer, how should I pay?
data.answer:
A. We ask that you pay once a month. 
We will issue a receipt at the end of the month and send it to your company, so please pay within 7 days after receiving it.

source.title: [URGENT] Technical Issue Impacting Email Server with Our Hotel in Vietnam
source.content:
Dear Valued Guests, 

We would like to inform you about a temporary technical issue affecting email communication specifically for our Vietnam hotel. 
Due to a recent error in our mail server, guests are currently unable to send emails to our Vietnam hotel email address. We understand the importance of seamless communication, especially when planning your stay with us or seeking assistance during your visit. 
Our technical team is working diligently to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, if you need to contact us or have any inquiries, please use the following alternative methods: 
1. Sending emails to the following email addresses: 

+ Hai Ba Trung 1: azumayahaibatrungreservation@gmail.com 
+ Kim Ma 2:reservationhanoi32019@gmail.com 
 + Kim Ma 3: reservationhanoi6@gmail.com 
+ Linh Lang: reservationlinhlang@gmail.com 
+ Hai Phong: reservationhaiphong2024@gmail.com 
+ Da Nang: danangazumaya@gmail.com 
+ Thai Van Lung 1: reservation.az@gmail.com 
+ Thai Van Lung 2: reservation4.aztvl2@gmail.com 
+ Le Thanh Ton: azltt.reservation@gmail.com 
+ Annex: reservation.az@gmail.com 

2. Calling to hotel hotline: 
+ Hai Ba Trung 1: +84.24.6278 6688 & +84.24.6278 6689 
+ Kim Ma 2: +84.24.3724 7570 
+ Kim Ma 3: +84.24.3862 0620 
+ Linh Lang: +84.24.3862 0620 
+ Hai Phong: +84.225.3828 969 
+ Da Nang: +84.24.3862 0620 
+ Thai Van Lung 1: +84.28.3824 6835 
+ Thai Van Lung 2: +84.28.3827 1071 & +84.28.3827.1072 
 + Le Thanh Ton: +84.28.3827 1110 
+ Annex: +84.28.3824 6835 

Thank you for choosing Azumaya Hotel. We look forward to serving you and providing an exceptional experience during your stay in Vietnam.

source.title: 2024 Tet (Lunar New Year) Information
source.content:
Happy new year. Thank you for your continued support of Azumaya Hotel.
We would like to inform you of the business hours and services during the 2024 Tet (Lunar New Year) period.

【 Ho Chi Minh 】
– Thai Van Lung 1 open normally –
・Massage ：February 9th to 12th close ( resumed from February 13th )
– Thai Van Lung 2 : February 3rd to 18th close ( resumed from February 19th )
– Le Thanh Ton : February 5th to 18th close ( resumed from February 19th )

【 Ha Noi 】 
– Kim Ma 3 open normally –
Kim Ma 2 : February 7th to 14th close ( resumed from February 15th )
Hai Ba Trung 1 : February 8th to 16th close ( resumed from February 17th )
Linh Lang : February 7th to 16th close ( resumed from February 17th )

【 Da Nang 】
February 3rd to 14th close ( resumed from February 15th )

【 Hai Phong 】 
February 4th to 10th close ( resumed from February 11th )

We hope you can relax at Azumaya Hotel during the Tet period.
We look forward to your continued support in 2024.

source.title: Open Air Hot Bath Renewal Open @ Azumaya Thai Van Lung 1
source.content:
Azumaya Thai Van Lung 1 open air hot bath will reopen on 17th Jan 2024 after renovation. We will expand the Sauna and Cold water bathtub and exchange tiles so that guests can use our open air hot bath more comfortably. Guests can use the Open Air Hot Bath in Azumaya Thai Van Lung 2 (30 seconds on foot from Azumaya Thai Van Lung 1) until reopening.
Please come and enjoy our new open air hot bath, cold bath and sauna.

*Along with this renewal construction, our open air hot bath for female guests is open from 17:00~18:45 on weekdays only at Le Thanh Ton branch.

source.title: Azumaya Ho Chi Minh 2024 New Year Day Limited Breakfast Set Menu
source.content:
Azumaya Ho Chi Minh will serve New Year Special Set Menu on 1st Jan 2024.
Please enjoy the New Year limited menu cooked by our staff with love.
Opening hour: 6am~10am
Place: Azumaya Thai Van Lung 1, Azumaya Thai Van Lung 2, Azumaya Le Than Ton

Openning hours are as follows.

Staying guest in Other Azumaya Hanoi Branch and visitors

source.title: ★ Notice of Vietnam Value Added Tax (VAT) change ★
source.content: From July 1st 2023 to December 31st 2023, Vietnam Value Added Tax (VAT) will be applied at 8%. We appreciate your understanding.

source.title: Reopen Massage service from Apr 2022
source.content:
Dear Valued guest, 

Thank you so much for interesting in Azumaya Hotel Da Nang‘s Foot Massage service. 
We are very happy to inform you that, the Foot Massage service will reopen time from Apr 01(Fri) with schedule as below: 

+ Mon ~ Fri: 2 pm-10:30 pm (last entry: 10:15 pm) 
+ Sat ~ Sun: 12 pm-10:30 pm (last entry: 10:15 pm) 

Due to the request of the Da Nang government regarding the situation of the Covid-19 epidemic, please Present the QR code on the Danang Smart City app or PC-Covid, Khaibaoytedanang, tokhaiyte at the Reception. 
We look forward to welcoming you. 
Please come by all means!

contract.title: Azumaya Hotel applies corporate contracts with special rates for  companies which have frequently business travelers to Southeast Asia. Please consider this opportunity.

feature.title: Japanese breakfast
feature.content: Azumaya Hotel is proud to bring an energized day with a delicious breakfast. We take care of the variety of dishes so that long-stay guests will not get bored.

feature.title: Japanese hospitality
feature.content: We serve you with your Japanese available staff who are not confident with English speaking but you can rest assured to using our service.

feature.title: Japanese-style Open-air hot bath-tub with Sauna
feature.content: Before commuting and after coming back from a long day work, please feel free to soak and relax. Sauna room and cold pool available (※Some branches are not included))

contract.additional: In addition, we provide a comfortable environment such as free WIFI, International TV channels, yukata provided (Vietnamese store only), and laundry service.
contract.benefit-content: Your company will not need to sign a separate contract with each branch in each contract because we will update information and apply of all 10 Azumaya branches in Vietnam and Cambodia. This will be convenient for customers who often have business trips to South-East Asia
contract.receipt-content: Contracts are available not only to corporations in Japan but also to corporations in Vietnam. Please note that receipts will be issued depending on the payment method depending on the address where the contract is be noted.

contractJP.content: 1. VAT invoice can be issued If you pay by credit card (VISA, MASTER CARD, JCB, NAPAS) or cash at the hotel reception (however, please provide your Vietnamese company information in advance).
2. For company transfer payment, we will issue Hotel Invoice only

contract.contractVN-content: VAT invoice can be issued with any payment method
contract.about-content:
No need registration fees (joining fees, annual membership fees)

After you filled the information in this form, we will send you a contract file sample, so please consider the terms of the contract. If you agree, we will send to you about the way to making contract. You can complete the signing and seal until latest on your check-in date to get contract benefits.
(Please send scan version first, then please send newpost the original contract to our address or give it to reception when check in).

FAQ-trigger.content: Q. Contract with corporations in Japan, How should I enter the tax code field?
FAQ-trigger.answer: A. If we don't have Tax code, you can leaving it

FAQ-trigger.content: Q. Can I sign a contract in the name of member in charge instead of the representative director?
FAQ-trigger.answer: A. You can make contract with the signature and seal of your company's representative.

FAQ-trigger.content: Q. What are the benefit of signing corporate contract?
FAQ-trigger.answer:
A. Depending on the length of stay, customer can get discount on roomrate or can use our free laundry service. We also give free massage voucher for long staying customer 
When applying the free laundry benefit noted points: 
Although it is set at 120,000VND/day, it is not a daily limited. 
The total amount laundry based on the number of nights you stay can be used during your stay. 
Example: For a stay of 5 nights and 6 days, Total free laundry amount 120,000VND x 5 nights = maximum amount of 600,000VND / 5 nights 
If your total laundry amount be over that, the excess amount will be charged when checkout. 

Reference price (Maybe different with each area): 
Y-shirt: 20.000VND, Pants: 20.000VND, Underwear: 15.000VND, sock: 15.000VND

cancel-content.content: If you don't know about the contact information such as address, telephone number, email address, etc.。
In the case of harm or damage to hotel guests, hotel (facilities, equipment, supplies, etc.) or hotel employees.
In the cases non-observance of the booking regulations.
In the cases assault, injury, intimidation, blackmail, coercive injustice and related crimes
In the cases, determined to be an organized crime group, a member of an organized crime group, an organized crime group-related organization, or a person related to such organization
In the cases determined that an organized crime group or a member of an organized crime group is affiliated with a corporation or other organization that controls business activities.
In the cases where determined to be an anti-social organization or affiliated with it.
In other cases where the hotel deems it inappropriate.

contract.form-title:
If you requested to make contract with your company in Japan, Please enter the Japan information 

If you requested to make contract with your company in Vietnam, Please enter the Vietnam information

error.title: The page you are looking for does not exist
error.feedback_content:
Thank you for visiting our new website! We strive to provide you with the best experience possible, and your feedback is invaluable in helping us achieve that goal. 
If you have encountered any errors, bugs, or issues while using our website, please take a moment to fill out this form. 
Your input will assist our team in identifying and resolving these issues promptly.
error.feedback_instruction1: + Please provide as much detail as possible about the error or issue you encountered.
error.feedback_instruction2: + Include information such as the page URL, steps to reproduce the error, browser/device used, and any error messages displayed.
error.feedback_instruction3: + Your feedback will remain confidential and will only be used for improving our website.
error.feedback_1: Describe the error or issue encountered:
error.feedback_2: URL of the page where the error occurred:
error.feedback_3: Steps to reproduce the error (if known):
error.feedback_4: Browser and device used (e.g., Chrome on Windows, Safari on iPhone):

room_pp.print_fee1: Free 1~10 pages/day ・ from 11 pages: $0.1/page per day

Visitor

set menu 6$

room_pp.attentionContent:
Recently, the number of snatching crime by motor driver is increasing
Please be aware of bag snatcher while you are walking along the streets.
If any help is needed, please don't hesitate to call us.
room_pp.thanks: Thank you for choosing us! Please enjoy your stay in Azumaya!
room_pp.contact1: Reservation can be made via phone:
room_pp.locationContent: We are located in front of the Phnom Penh Tower, which can save up your commute time. In addition, it is easily accessible to various sites in Phnom Penh.
room_pp.address: Address : No. 302 St.228, Phnom Penh, Cambodia (In front of Phnom Penh Tower)

home_pp.name: Azumaya Hotel
home_pp.welcome_content: Nowadays, more and more businessmen from advanced countries move into Phnom Penh (Cambodia). However, during the stay, there must be many anxieties to face; such as languages and food. For their distress, we had one mission came into our mind. “Why don’t we provide comfortable space to relieve their stress?” The answer was clear: we prepare Rotenburo (open air bath tub) and foot massage to soothe their tiredness, and authentic Japanese breakfast & continental breakfast for their daily vitality. Following ― English-available receptionist, pick-up / drop-off service from / to airport, free laundry service for long-stay customers, free high-speed Wi-Fi service, arrangement service for rental car / tour, etc. Moreover, “Omotenashi” (Japanese hospitality) is always in our heart to serve you a pleasure in life of foreign land.

new_item.new: Re-opening Open Air Hot Bath for Visitor from 24th May 2023
Notice of Open Air Hot Bath Visitor Service Closing from April 1st 2022
Re-opening Open Air Hot Bath and Massage from October 18th, 2021

feature_pp.name: Feature
feature_pp.main_content: Thank you always for your kind attention to Azumaya Hotel.Azumaya Hotel is a Japanese-style business hotel opened in Phnom Penh for whom are stressed out with their business trip and looking for comfortable place to be relieved. We serve 6 characteristics of service with the same quality as our Vietnam branches.

feature_item.title: Reasonable price from $40 per night
feature_item.content: All rooms have shower toilet and amenity which are ordered from Japanese supplyer, 8 kinds of amenities including small head toothbrush, shaving and conditioner are prepared. You can stay with cheaper price with signing our contract. We would like offer more discounts for long term resident. Please feel free to contact to our receptionist.

feature_item.title: Best location for Japanese businessmen
feature_item.content: We are located in front of the Phnom Penh Tower, which can save up your commute time. In addition, it is easily accessible to various sites in Phnom Penh.

feature_item.title: Japanese-style open-air hot bath with Sauna
feature_item.content:
Here is the only place you can find Japanese style hot tub in Phnom Penh. We also have cold water bathtub, which you can experience sensational feeling of comfort in this roasting country.
※ Women time : 11:15pm-1:15am (everyday)

feature_item.title: Japanese breakfast
feature_item.content: Grilled fish, stewed meat, fried seafood, sautéed vegetables, and some other remarkable Japanese dishes you can enjoy. We also have authentic continental breakfast for whom wants to have a break for Asian food. From 2017, we are going to have buffet from 6am to 8am.

feature_item.title: Original style foot massage
feature_item.content: Completely outstanding and memorable massage opened in Phnom Penh. Over 90% are the repeat customers in Vietnam, we have absolute confident in our massage. Mainly we rub and push the point from head, shoulder, back, and finally to feet. To release the tiredness, find yourself great pleasure at our massage.

feature_item.title: Japanese hospitality
feature_item.content: We serve you with our Japanese available staff and manager for whom are not confident with English speaking.

feature_item.title: Japanese TV shows available
feature_item.content: You can watch the main local Japanese TV shows such as NHK, TBS, Fuji TV, Nihon TV in live same as you do in Japan. Please lean back and relax watching your favorite TV shows.

feature_item.title: Japanese Restaurant Tenant Wanted
feature_item.content: We are looking for restaurant tenants who have a great passion to serve delicious food to our guests and local customers. For more details, please contact us by email.

data.name: EARLY CHECK-IN
data.content:
Will be subject to the availability of hotel room status.
- Check in early until 10:00 : 100% charged of one night room rate.
- Check in early from 10:00 and before 15:00 : 50% charged of one night room rate.

data.name: CHECK-OUT LATE
data.content:
Will be subject to the availability of hotel room status.
- Check out late until 18:00 : 50% charged of the one night.
- Check out late from 18:00 : 100% charged of the one night.

data.name: LATE CANCELLATION
data.content:
- In 48 hours prior to 15:00 of check in date : 50% charged of overnight.
- In 24 hours prior to 15:00 of check in date: 100% charged overnight.

data.name: EARLY CHECK-OUT
data.content:
- In 48 hours prior to 15:00 of new check out date: 50% charged of one last night.
- In 24 hours prior to 15:00 of new check out date: 100% charged of one last night.

data.name: ADVANNCED PAYMENT BEFORE CHECK-OUT
data.content: We do welcome the payment before check-out to make it smoothly.

data.name: Exchange rate is based on
data.content: The hotel rate upon check-out date for non-contractor. The selling rate of ACLEDA BANK at 6:00 upon check-out date for contractor.

data.name: Please be noted
data.content:
1.The Booking Confirmation (we will send you by e-mail) should be showed to Reception upon Check-in.
2.The valid Passport ( non Cambodian ) or ID ( Cambodian ) is required for guest registration as Cambodian laws
